name: Roachling Lord
description: The Roachling Lord is a small humanoid characterized by its agility and off-putting scent. It has a commendable Armor Class, making it relatively difficult to hit.
memorable: Its immunity to diseases and the ability to evade detection make the Roachling Lord a unique and clever opponent.
goals: To outmaneuver foes and leverage its stealth capabilities.
relations: Related to other roach-like creatures, often encountered in groups.
environment: Thrives in environments where stealth and cunning are crucial.
strengths: Good at avoiding detection with high Stealth skill, and is immune to diseases.
weaknesses: Disadvantage on Charisma checks when interacting with humanoids due to its unpleasant scent.
attacks: Engages enemies using a multiattack with its Begrimed Shortsword and Begrimed Dart, inflicting both piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: The Hardy ability grants full immunity to diseases and advantage on Constitution saving throws.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 60 feet and tremorsense up to 10 feet, enabling effective navigation in low-light environments.
skills: Proficient in Acrobatics and Stealth, with bonuses that enhance its ability to avoid detection.
additional_information: Advantage on Constitution saving throws increases resilience.
Can negate its unpleasant scent temporarily with thorough bathing.
High Dexterity score provides adeptness in stealth.
Strategic skirmisher using agility to inflict damage without direct confrontation.
Uses poison damage in attacks, increasing lethality.
test_queries: sneaky roach creature immune to disease
crafty monster skilled in stealth and acrobatics
